text:
At http://ant.apache.org/manual/CoreTasks/war.html it says in the 4th paragraph:

"The task will fail if the file is not included, unless the needxmlfile attribute is set to true."

The last word should be "false".

A bit further down the page in the "Parameters" section, at the attribute description for "needxmlfile" it says:

"Flag to indicate whether or not the web.xml file is needed. I=it should be set to false when generating servlet 2.5+ WAR files without a web.xml file. Since Ant 1.7"

The second sentence starts with "I=it" which should be "It".
